name: The Spooky Cave
description:
The Spooky Cave is a modern take on classical rogue-like RPGs. The traditional tile based movement has been removed but, the ability to stop the game when you stop inputting controls remains. I am attempting to introduce streamlined gameplay while also increasing the depth of combat and interaction. It's hard to explain the game feel without playing it, so just give it a shot, and remember dying is fun! :)

move = wads/mouse-middle/l-stick

sprint = shift/l-bumper

point weapon = arrows/mouse/r-stick

shield = space/rightclick/r-bumper

inventory = tab/back/select

version 0.37
